abstract: The Rebel T1i may be the entry-level digital single-lens reflex camera to beat this spring.
snippet: The Rebel T1i may be the entry-level digital single-lens reflex camera to beat this spring.
lead_paragraph: There’s a lot of buzz about the new Canon Rebel T1i D.S.L.R., the first Rebel with high-definition video capture capabilities. At $800 (body only), this entry-level model is now the cheapest way to get HD-video capabilities in a D.S.L.R. camera.

headline.main: From Canon, a D.S.L.R. That Shoots HD Video, Too
headline.print_headline: Stepping Up to a D.S.L.R.? This One Shoots HD Video, Too
